item.title: How do you train a pug? Master a few of these essentials
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: **The most important thing to remember is that there are different ways to train a pug, and there are different times and methods to train a pug. This is a very important part of the process. The content of training a pug should be from simple to difficult, from behavioral awareness training to skill training. Parents can first train the pug to develop a regular diet, excretion and sleeping habits.

item.title: Intensive training to overcome the natural fear of heights, customized harnesses to ensure air stability, and skydiving "canine soldiers" are made this way!

item.description: Hi there! Tinker Bell in training Tinker Bell practicing airborne posture with the paratroopers. The first time I was in the city, I was in the city, and the second time I was in the city. Have you ever seen a military dog that can jump out of a plane? Airborne troops in Kaifeng a brigade’s dog Dingdong, recently in the airborne training with airborne troops from 1200 meters altitude parachute success.
